pr_title: Bump version used when manually building Vespa

timeline.message:
Bump version used when manually building Vespa

Prior 7.0.0 version would trigger the negotiation of pre-protobuf
protocols in the content layer backend, as these were introduced
in 7.41. Bump to the latest open source RPM release at the time
of writing.

timeline.bodyText: Consider 7.164.0, to support the detection of snapshot versions (cf vespa-engine/system-test#474)
timeline.author: toregge

timeline.message: Use a micro version of 0 to denote a snapshot build
